comments:
eclipse.buildId=I200405211200 ("official" M9)
java.version=1.4.2_04
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
"official" last cheeta5 build from update site.

I try to debug in one project with 1.5 compiler on.
While debugging, i try to add a breakpoint in a classfile editor (class from jar 
with attached sources, e.g. JDK 1.5 "java.lang.Long" class etc).
I see always this error - 
'An internal error occurred during: "Breakpoint location validation".'

The same error i see on some java editors in current project - but not always, 
and i cant understand why.

Stack trace (always the same):

java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: Operation only supported in JLS2 AST
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode.supportedOnlyIn2(ASTNode.java:1777)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.Javadoc.setComment(Javadoc.java:235)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.DocCommentParser.setComment(DocCommentParser.java:
74)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.DocCommentParser.parse(DocCommentParser.java:63)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.DocCommentParser.parse(DocCommentParser.java:49)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTConverter.createComment(ASTConverter.java:2333)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTConverter.buildCommentsTable(ASTConverter.java:
233)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTConverter.convert(ASTConverter.java:941)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTParser.convert(ASTParser.java:718)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTParser.internalCreateAST(ASTParser.java:677)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTParser.createAST(ASTParser.java:573)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.BreakpointLocationVerifierJob.
run(BreakpointLocationVerifierJob.java:104)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

Move to JDT/UI.
When the mode is 1.5, the JLS level of the DOM/AST should be 3.0 and not 2.0.
I can reproduce the problem. Do you have a specific test case ?
Sorry, I haven't, even because I can't understand when it exactly happens.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 66152 ***

traces.message: Operation only supported in JLS2 AST
